Class Relationship

A one-to-one relationship between two DataObjects.

See Data for usage examples.

Summary
  • Relationship.type indicates the type of the relationship
  • Relationship.relating the relating DataObject
  • Relationship.related the related DataObject

Hierarchy

  • Relationship

Index

Properties

Properties

Readonly related

related: DataObject
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/data/Relationship.ts:35

The related DataObject in this Relationship.

This Relationship will be stored by DataObject.type in the DataObject's DataObject.relating attribute.

Readonly relating

relating: DataObject
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/data/Relationship.ts:28

The relating DataObject in this Relationship.

This Relationship will be stored by DataObject.type in the DataObject's DataObject.related attribute.

Readonly type

type: number
  • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/data/Relationship.ts:21

The type of this Relationship.

This can be any value that identifies the Relationship type within your DataModel.
